properties.areaDesc: Galveston Island and Bolivar Peninsula; Matagorda Islands; Brazoria Islands
properties.headline: Rip Current Statement issued January 9 at 9:31AM CST until January 10 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dangerous rip currents.

* WHERE...Matagorda Islands, Brazoria Islands and Galveston
Island and Bolivar Peninsula Counties.

* WHEN...Through late tonight.

* IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away
from shore into deeper water.
properties.instruction:
Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float.
Don't swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction
following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and
call or wave for help.

NWSheadline: HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT
